attributes.action: assist in the funding of the relocation of 2328 (bishops cleeve) sqn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 2328 (bihops cleeve) sqn started out small with just a max of 18 cadets. recently, the numbers have sky rocketed. this has left us with limited room and capabilities. we don't wish to kick any out any cadets. we have a plot of land alocated to our need. all we need is the funding

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
